parts.name: sidebar-archive
parts.html:
Sidebar section title

The Archive template shows a list of posts grouped by category, author, date, tag, etc. The template includes a sidebar.

Sidebar section title

Use the Block editor to modify the sidebar section, and add as many additional content to the sidebar as needed.

parts.name: sidebar-search
parts.html:
Sidebar section title

The Search template is displayed when using a search form. Depending on the search term, the template displays either a list of found pages or a message with search info.

Sidebar section title

Use the Block editor to modify the sidebar section, and add as many additional content to the sidebar as needed.

templates.html:
404: Page not found

It looks like nothing was found at this location. Maybe try a search?

Section title

The 404 template appears when a user lands on a page that does not exist. Use the sidebar to help the user navigate the website with additional info or links.

templates.name: front-page
templates.html:
Professional WordPress theme

Start using a professional WordPress theme by Themes Harbor to improve online presence, and take brand to next level

Section main title

Section title

Sample text, which can be edited using the Block editor, to fit your needs. The title can be edited as well, with an option to add a link.

Section title

It is possible to duplicate or to remove items in the section using the Block editor. Also, change font sizes and colors if needed.

Section title

Use List View in the top toolbar of the Block editor to select main Group block of the section. Then, click Modify to make changes.

This pattern displays three (3) showcase sections with images, titles and descriptions. The pattern also displays a section title and description.

Section main title

Section title

Sample text, which can be edited using the Block editor, to fit your needs.

Section title

Select main Group block of the section and click Modify to make changes.

Section title

You can duplicate or remove items in the section using the Block editor.

Section title

After making changes, select main Group block again and click Done.

This pattern displays a grid of items with image, title, and description. Also, the pattern displays a section title and description.

Section main title

"WordPress is software designed for everyone, emphasizing accessibility, performance, security, and ease of use. We believe great software should work with minimum set up, so you can focus on sharing your story, product, or services freely."

Jane Smith

"The basic WordPress software is simple and predictable so you can easily get started. It also offers powerful features for growth and success."

Tom Doe

"The WordPress community is welcoming and inclusive. Our contributors passion drives the success of WordPress which, in turn, helps you reach your goals.

WordPress is open source software that is both free and priceless."

Kate Passion

This pattern displays list of three (3) quotes with images and captions. The pattern also displays a section title and description.

Section main title

This pattern displays latest four (4) posts. Each post displays title, date and categories. The pattern also displays a section title and description.
